name: Blabblelogue
description:
Blabblelogue

>> ludum dare page <<

by Peter Rockwell, Cody Walker, Nicolas Munoz
consultant wizard: Kira Boom

You are a lonely traveller on a distant plain. Along your journey you cross paths with fellow travellers and stop awhile to chat.

Controls:

[ SPACE ] - hold to talk
[ F11 ] - fullscreen
[ ` ] - toggle debug mode

-- do not press space to listen to the full soundtrack --
